data.text: @tiotheo01 So who's been paying antivaxx lobbyist? Habbatussauda seller? If yes, I want in. 🤣
@ZerocoolC19 He doesn't even write much. All he and his team do is compile bits and pieces of social media bullshit and call it a day. I refuse to call that journalism.

@tiotheo01 What's up with that narcissist, sociopath journalist lah? Suka attack orang sana-sini. Thought busy with his writing/reporting projects. But got so much time membawang on Twitter. Immature + unprofessionalnya dia tu...

@tiotheo01 @jingukzz "clarifying" 😂

Everytime someone come with "the decision is based on recent data" noone dare to ask what data, show us how the data conclude to your decision making...

@korzuen @tiotheo01 Would those questions are allowed to be asked? We can argue days about this on social medias but if they're still filtering the journalist, it won't make a huge impact nevertheless, well..we could change some of the public views on it.

@korzuen @jingukzz Nope. 

"Thank you, YB"

This fella is easily satisfied. 😂

Buttt when it comes to AEFI and vaccine ineffectiveness... https://t.co/iRDWeUyTOM
@iszhcg @tiotheo01 Me too. But FB posts are making round here. Why la 🤦‍♂️
@tiotheo01 @jingukzz As a journalist... Did he care to ask what it means by "90% protection" and how it was calculated? Any journalist dare to ask?
